target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings, so the target vulnerability (unchecked downcasting in deposit function) was not identified at all.

notes: The audit incorrectly marked the contract as safe. SimpleBank (without SafeCast) has a critical unchecked downcasting vulnerability in deposit() where uint256 amount is implicitly cast to uint8, causing silent truncation for values > 255. SimpleBankB uses SafeCast.toUint8() which properly reverts on overflow, demonstrating the fix. The audit missed this entirely.
